parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Did you hear what Leya was up to last night? \|\|\^
Well, she was found in the West Courtyard practising sword fighting - \|\|\^
- by herself despite Mother telling her to stop doing it. \|\|\^
Really? I bet you she was so bad at it. Anyway, what happened? \|\|\^
Well, she’s been confined to her bed-chamber. Mother is not in a good - \|\|\^
- mood. Besides I’m sure she was no worse than you. \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.
We're going to be doing this for every emote! Make sure to wait 20 frames
before the next dialogue or the pictures will insta-change rather than
I'm capable of fighting. Shouldn’t you be preparing for the arrival of - \|\|\^
I’m not exactly sure what to do and no I haven’t told her yet but - \|\|\^
- I will today. I’ve just been looking for the right moment. \|\|\^
After a small wait (1 second, plus 20 frames for the picture
sliding), make harold look up, wait 20 more frames or so then
It doesn’t matter what moment you pick, the outcome will still be the same. \|\|\^
After a small wait (1 second, plus 20 frames for the picture

Idelle still hasn’t told me her thing yet. So can you tell me? \|\|\^
No, I told you Idelle has to be the one to tell you. \|\|\^
Fine! When does Father get back I want to tell him about my fighting lessons. \|\|\^
He gets back in 4 days. I am sure he’ll be thrilled to hear about you - \|\|\^
- learning how to fight. Idelle's coming, you might be in luck she might - \|\|\^
Hey guys, what are you doing? \|\|\^
Well, Cedric, I have something to tell you. Richard already knows this - \|\|\^
- but Mother has told me I am to wed Prince Dormato of the Kingdom - \|\|\^
- of Luthania. I am to leave for Luthania shortly after Father comes home. \|\|\^
You’re getting married too? And you’re leaving? \|\|\^
Yes, I am. I’m so excited I’m going to be a princess and someday a - \|\|\^
- queen. I will finally be a woman and Mother won’t be there treating - \|\|\^
Yes. Even Leya can’t annoy me when I’m all the way in Luthania. \|\|\^
Oh please. We all know you’ll miss Leya when you are gone. \|\|\^
We all know you will Idelle. We know you too well. \|\|\^
No, you don’t You don’t know me that well if you think I’m going to - \|\|\^
Really? Let’s play a guessing game. If I win it proves I know you well - \|\|\^
This is absurd but very well. It will be fun seeing you fail at this. \|\|\^
The aim of the game is to choose the gesture that
Choose a gesture and play to see if you win.
The player with the most wins will win the game.
What is the name of the man I am to marry?
What kingdom does he live in?
Who is my least favourite sibling?
What is the order of age of the 4 of us?
How did I celebrate my last birthday?
What did I eat for dinner last night?
What is the name of my dog?
What is the best gift I have ever recieved?
What is Fathers nickname for me?
